title: Only a Breath Away
description: Who is looping? Who is changing history?As Magnus has said, "Ormr is after the crown, I need to get there first," but who is twisting time and causing the mess?Kaitlyn and Magnus and their family are in 13th century Scotland, they're trying to stick together, attempting to keep their memories intact while their timeline crumbles around them.With new time travel twists and turns, the next book in Mr and Mrs Campbell's history promises excitement and more more more adventure, with contemporary scenes and historical flourishes, coming in Spring 2022â€” book 16, Only a Breath Away.
author: Diana Knightley
